document.full_text: geoffrey mutai's time of 2 hours, 3 minutes, 2 seconds in last week's boston marathon does not qualify for the world record, race officials conceded on wednesday even as they sought to develop new rules that would better account for the difficulty of the hilly course.
document.title: mutai's got world best in marathon, and that's all
lines_and_colors: geoffrey mutai's time of 2 hours, 3 minutes, 2 seconds in last week's boston marathon does not qualify for the world record, race officials conceded on wednesday even as they sought to develop new rules that would better account for the difficulty of the hilly course.
